column1: {{Ent infobox
'''Leaflock''', called '''Finglas''' in [[Sindarin]], was one of the [[Ents]] of [[Fangorn Forest]]. Finglas, [[Skinbark
column3: Fangorn]], were the oldest of the [[Ents]] of Fangorn Forest still alive in the later [[Third Age]].

column1: According to [[Treebeard]], Leaflock had become tired, sometimes sleeping through entire seasons (although formerly he used to rouse up in winter), and tree-like with a covering of leafy hair.<ref name=iii4>{{TT
==Etymology==
The name ''Finglas'' is apparently composed by the two elements ''[[fing]]/[[find]]'' "lock of hair" and ''[[las]]'' "leaf".<ref>{{HM
The element ''lock'' in ''Leaflock'' here has the meaning of "hair" since it is a translation of his [[Sindarin]] name.<ref name="Nomen">{{HM
The name obviously refers to his being "Covered with leafy hair".<ref name=iii4/>

:[http://lotrtcgwiki.com/wiki/lotr15030 A card] in [[Decipher]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]] identifies one of the Ents at [[Isengard]] as Leaflock.
'''2012: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Riders of Rohan]]'':'''
:Leaflock is found in the North-Western part of the Fangorn Forest, near the borders of Rohan.
